At t=5s, the displacement of the car is 35m; at t=3s, the displacement of the car is 30m. Therefore, at t=3s, the car has rear-ended the truck.
The car's speed is 30m/s, and the truck's speed is 10m/s. The car applies emergency brakes, but the brakes fail, causing the car to stop at t=3s.
Since the car's speed is greater than the truck's speed, the car will overtake the truck.
